page.title: 10SEAVIEW YACHT CLUB
page.content: Seaview Yacht Club was established in 1893. It has a{present membership}of over 900 paying an annual {subscription}of Â£42. About 200 of these members are resident on the Isle of Wight. The club caters for{all classes of {yachts and dingies.}It also includes facilities for{sailboarding.} Situated on Nettlestone Point it has the advantage of{immediate access to the {open waters of the Solent. The 12 foot{Seaview Dingy}and the 23 foot{Mermaid}are two classes unique to the club. There are{moorings}for 102 seaview Dingies and 10 Mermaids as well as about 50 places for visitors. { Regular races}are organised on a handicap cruiser basis. The club also hosts national events. A{regatta}is held annually.
